alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 10:40AM PST until February 22 at 8:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast California, southern Nevada and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Periods of blowing dust may also occur resulting in lowered driving visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sudden winds gusting to 50 MPH are possible this evening across highway 95 in Clark County near Desert Rock and Indian Springs, which may cause additional travel impacts if motorists are unprepared for the sudden crosswinds.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin
